datoCmsKey.name: Katie Haan
datoCmsKey.genderIdentity: I identity as a cisgender woman
datoCmsKey.discipline: musical theatre roots with a growing passion for film
datoCmsKey.bio:
Hey Y’all! I’m Katie!
I’m a born and raised Hoosier turned New Yorker with a passion for storytelling. I graduated from the Musical Theatre program at Marymount Manhattan College in 2019, and am continuing to work in the city. Aside from acting, I’m an active writer and comedian. I have a special place in my heart for sharing queer narratives, let me tell yours!
